title: OnePlus 9R finally receives its first OxygenOS 12 Open Beta based on Android 12
content:
Although the OnePlus 9 and 9 Pro received the stable OxygenOS 12 update based on Android 12 a while ago after an extensive beta testing phase, the more-affordable OnePlus 9R didn’t receive a single Open Beta update since its launch â€” until now. The first OxygenOS 12 Open Beta build for the device is finally

The post OnePlus 9R finally receives its first OxygenOS 12 Open Beta based on Android 12 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OxygenOS 12 based on Android 12 is finally here for the OnePlus 9R as its first Open Beta release. Read on to know more!
